id: Death toll from Hurricane Michael rises to 36
paragraph: Set edition preference:Set edition preference:Set edition preference:By Dakin Andone, CNNUpdated 4:51 PM ET, Sat October 20, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds. (CNN)At least 36 people have been confirmed dead as a result of Hurricane Michael, according to authorities.
